titles.title: Federal Employee Performance and Accountability Act of 2024
Federal Employee Performance and Accountability Act of 2024

A bill to implement a 5-year pilot program establishing a performance-based pay structure for certain Federal employees in order to enhance productivity, accountability, and employee satisfaction in public service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
